name: Heart of Depth
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Hydro Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Dice</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

storytext: "For all deaths are in vain. There is no saving those who indulge in the past."
